ComicInfo.Summary:
Magdalena introduces Dinah to her boss, the owner of a hardcore strip club of sorts, he doesn't want to employ Dinah and she doesn't want to be employed but through it all Magdalena continues to encourage her, try and get her to accept her feminity, namely through taking advantage of men, making them yearn for her. While the two talk, Magdalena reveals the real reason she befriended Dinah and wants to help her, than the two make love. Finally, because of all the help that Magda has given her, Dinah decides to give the profession a chance and although she hates doing it, she finds that she is quite skillful at it and afterward Magdalena tells Dinah that she was very impressed. Then they arrive at their van to find an eviscerated carcass on spread all over it, not knowing why.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:02:09. [CVDB149957]
